scripts.additional: cp node_modules dist/node_modules -R && cp serverless.yaml dist/serverless.yaml
scripts.archive: (rm -rf temp-app.zip && zip -r temp-app.zip layers node_modules todos .gitignore package.json package-lock.json README.md serverless.yml)
scripts.build: npm install && cp -r node_modules layers/dependencies/nodejs && cd layers/dependencies && zip -r nodejs.zip nodejs/
